name: AskNewLifeMission
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new life mission
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get Alexa to ask New Life Mission questions on the gospel of water and the Spirit. This skill lets you use your voice to ask questions from sermons on important subjects by Reverend Paul C Jong. Enjoy a hands free interactive question and answer experience without typing, reading or visiting the website. To start the conversation You can ask any one of the following question: What is sin? What is the Gospel of water and the spirit? what is the theory of predestination? and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
